Welcome

I am Juan Rodriguez, the man, the myth, the full-stack developer! I am the master of code, the conqueror of bugs, and the savior of websites. Some say I was born with a keyboard in my hand, while others claim I can debug an entire program with just a single glance. All we know is if you need someone to create a website that's so amazing, it'll make your grandma do the Macarena. I'm your guy!
